content: g-square purse designed by allena williams i designed this simple purse to teach crochet young girls just love this purse it demonstrates different stitches and how to change colors and joining materials size h hook 2 colors caron simply soft yarn notes double_crochet = double_crochet chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet chain 3 counts at 1st double_crochet chain 2 counts as 1st half_double_crochet st s = stitch es yo = yarn over granny square make 2 with color one chain 4 join to make a circle round 1 chain 3 15 double_crochet in ring 16 double_crochet total join to top of chain 3 round 2 chain 3 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in same stitch 1 double_crochet each in next 3 stitches * 2 double_crochet chain 1 2dc in next stitch 1 double_crochet each in next 3 stitches* repeat from * to * around sl st to join in top of chain 3 slip_stitch to corner round 3 join new color #2 chain 3 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in corner space 1 double_crochet each in next 6 sts * 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in corner space 1 double_crochet each in next 6 sts* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join in top of chain 3 slip_stitch to corner round 4 chain 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in corner space 1 half_double_crochet each in next 9 sts * 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 2hdc in corner space 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 9 sts* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join in top of chain 2 slip_stitch to corner round 5 join color #1 chain 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in corner space **working in back loops only** 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 12 sts * 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in corner space **in back loops only** 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 12 sts* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join in top of chain 2 slip_stitch to corner round 6 join color #2 chain 3 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in corner space ** working in back loops only** 1 double_crochet in each of the next 15 sts * 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next corner space **back loops** 1 double_crochet in each of the next 15 sts* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join in top of chain 3 slip_stitch to corner round 7 change to color #1 chain 1 4 single_crochet in corner space 5 total 1 single_crochet in each of the next 18 sts * 5 single_crochet in corner space 1 single_crochet in each of the next 18 sts* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to join in top of chain 1 finish off finishing and handle hold 2 squares wrong sides together join by single_crochet take your hook through the first st like you would to single_crochet normally then put your hook through the same st on
